tourBios.personal: Brother, Patricio, is also a member of the NEC Series - PGA TOUR Latinoamérica. Patricio also played college golf at Lynn College.
tourBios.prYrSeason: 2012: Claimed his first PGA TOUR Latinoamérica title, winning the Lexus Perú Open, the sixth event of the inaugural season of PGA TOUR Latinoamérica, in November. He entered the event, hosted by Los Inkas GC, his home club, thanks to an sponsor exemption. Shot 71-71-67-66 fto finish at 13-under and take home the check for U.S. $22,500. Surprisingly, that victory in his country's national open came 11 months after he decided to step away from competitive golf to take a job in sales at IASA Corp., a merchandising company in Lima.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the PGA TOUR Latinoameri was 1st in 2012 at the Lexus Peru Open.
